header.title: phpBB jQuery Base
header.description: This will add a jQuery Back-End to your forum, enabling you to use jQuery for several features of your forum.
header.author-notes: This MOD requires PHP 5.2.0 or newer and PECL json 1.2.0 or newer.

changelog.change: Purge caches via install script
Remove unneeded code from jquery_functions.php
Add ability to change interval for checking PMs via ACP interface
Fix unclean if-statements in jquery_base_header.html
Don't include pjB files if it's disabled via ACP
Don't remove phpBB's PM popup
Remove unneeded comments/code from jquery_base_header.html
Add changes in editor.js to jquery_base_header.html
Fix: return_ary is not defined when using mark read
Fix: Mark read setting in ACP has no effect
Fix: Quick login setting in ACP has no effect
Fix: Possible XSS exploit due to using {L_ instead of {LA_
Fix: Incorrect post time displayed after quickreply
Replace double quote and ampersand with correct character
Fix: Missing language variable L_QUICKEDIT_POST
